author: Jeffery Martin
title: U.K. Prime Minister Issues 'Stay-at-Home' Order to Limit Coronavirus Spread
description: "From this evening, I must give the British people a very simple instruction," Johnson said. "You must stay at home."
content:
U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced a strict "stay-at-home" policy in a Monday press conference which will affect the entire nation.
"From this evening, I must give the British people a very simple instruction," Johnson said. "You must stay at home."… [+1026 chars]
